name: Lenin Simulator
description:
The year is 1920. Time to take the reigns, call the shots, and mind your meters! Play as Vladimir Lenin as you manage post-revolution Russia.

Game Features


  • Choose responses to events and happenings
  • Favor certain politicians and disfavor others
  • See the effects of your gameplay rewrite history
  • Early game over paths, trap paths, easter eggs



Join the discord! Report the bugs in the bug channel
